short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let the User accept Matches on Renown.gg automatically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for Website Renown.gg - Counter-Strike 2 Matchmaking Platforms 
- Toggle auto Match Accept ON/OFF
- Plays a Sound when a Match is found and accepted

***Disclaimer***
AddOn is developed in and for English language.
To ensure full functionality, use the according Website in English language.
